autoTransport.title: Auto Transport Declaration
autoTransport.subtitle: Create import-transit declarations via auto transport

form.isTransportWeightCompliant: Is Transport Weight and Dimensions Compliant?
form.isCargoReloadedToAnotherTransport: Is Cargo Reloaded To Another Transport?

placeholder.fullName: Last Name First Name Middle Name

cargoShipmentStartCountry.required: Cargo shipment start country is required

cargoShipmentEndCountry.required: Cargo shipment end country is required

isTransportWithCargo.required: Please select whether transport is with cargo or not

isTransportAsGoods.required: Please select whether transport is as goods or not

isCargoReloadedToAnotherTransport.required: Please select whether cargo will be reloaded to another transport or not

isCargoAlreadyDeclared.required: Please select whether cargo was already declared or not

carrierPassportSeries.required: Carrier passport series and number is required

vehicleYear.required: Vehicle year of manufacture is required
vehicleYear.invalid: Year format is invalid (must be 4 digits)

help.transportType: Select the type of transport used for cargo shipment (road, railway, air, sea).
help.senderCustomsPost: Specify the customs post through which the cargo is dispatched.
help.cargoShipmentStartCountry: Select the country where cargo shipment begins.
help.cargoShipmentEndCountry: Select the country where cargo shipment ends.
help.isTransportWithCargo: Indicate whether the vehicle is loaded with cargo or empty.
help.isTransportAsGoods: Indicate whether the vehicle itself is goods for sale.
help.isTransportWeightCompliant: Confirm that the vehicle's weight and dimensions comply with established standards.
help.isTransportWindowTinted: Indicate whether the vehicle's windows are tinted.
help.isCargoReloadedToAnotherTransport: Indicate whether the cargo will be reloaded to another vehicle en route.
help.isCargoAlreadyDeclared: Indicate whether a customs declaration was previously issued for the cargo.
help.declarantType: Select who is filling out the declaration: vehicle owner (carrier) or driver.
help.entityType: Select the entity type: legal entity or individual person.
help.carrierEntityType: Indicate whether the carrier is a legal entity or an individual person.
help.carrierFullName: Enter the full last name, first name and middle name of the carrier.
help.carrierCitizenship: Select the country of citizenship of the carrier.
help.carrierTin: Enter the carrier's PIN (Personal Identification Number) or TIN (Tax Identification Number).
help.carrierPhone: Enter the phone number to contact the carrier.
help.carrierPassportSeries: Enter the carrier's passport series and number.
help.vehicleRegistrationNumber: Enter the state registration number of the vehicle.
help.vehicleBrand: Enter the vehicle brand (e.g.: MAN, Mercedes, Volvo).
help.vehicleYear: Enter the year the vehicle was manufactured (4-digit format).
help.vehicleRegistrationCountry: Select the country of vehicle registration.
help.trailerRegistrationNumber: If there is a trailer, enter its registration number.
help.trailerRegistrationCountry: If there is a trailer, select the country of its registration.
help.driverEntityType: Indicate whether the driver is a legal entity or an individual person.
help.driverFullName: Enter the full last name, first name and middle name of the driver.
help.driverCitizenship: Select the country of citizenship of the driver.
help.driverTin: Enter the driver's PIN (Personal Identification Number) or TIN (Tax Identification Number).
help.driverPhone: Enter the phone number to contact the driver.
help.driverPassportSeries: Enter the driver's passport series and number.
help.brokerTin: Enter the broker company's TIN (Tax Identification Number). Must consist of 9 digits.
help.brokerCompanyName: Enter the full name of the broker company.
help.brokerAddress: Enter the address of the broker company (MFY, street, house number).

vehicleLicenseUpload.title: Upload Vehicle License
vehicleLicenseUpload.description: Upload an image or scan of the vehicle registration certificate (technical passport).

declarationForm.title: Cargo Customs Declaration
declarationForm.declarationNumberInfo: Unique number of the customs declaration assigned upon registration
declarationForm.exporterNameInfo: Full legal name of the exporter company
declarationForm.exporterAddressInfo: Actual address of the exporter company
declarationForm.exporterCountryInfo: Country of dispatch of goods (code according to countries classifier)
declarationForm.exporterAdditionalInfoInfo: Additional information about the exporter (TIN, OKPO and other details)
declarationForm.sendButtonInfo: Send customs value declaration to customs values register
declarationForm.deleteButtonInfo: Remove customs declaration from customs values register

statusInfo.title: Declaration statuses:
statusInfo.reregistration: Change of goods information before release
statusInfo.redesign: Change of information after goods release

infoLabel.declarationNumberInfo: Unique number of the customs declaration assigned upon registration

declarationTypeInfo.title: 1. Declaration Type
declarationTypeInfo.subsection1: The first subdivision indicates the direction of goods movement — «IM»
declarationTypeInfo.subsection2: The second subdivision indicates the two-digit customs regime code according to the Customs Regimes Classifier
declarationTypeInfo.subsection3: the third subdivision is not filled

infoLabel.exporterNameInfo: Full legal name of the exporter company
infoLabel.exporterAddressInfo: Actual address of the exporter company
infoLabel.exporterCountryInfo: Country of dispatch of goods (code according to countries classifier)
infoLabel.exporterAdditionalInfoInfo: Additional information about the exporter (TIN, OKPO and other details)

exporterSectionInfo.title: 2. Exporter/Consignor
exporterSectionInfo.description: The graph indicates information about the person specified in the transport documents as the sender of goods.
exporterSectionInfo.label: The graph indicates:

individualPerson.title: If the consignor is an individual person:
individualPerson.description: surname, first name, patronymic of the individual person, his place of residence (short name of the country according to the World Countries Classifier and address)

legalEntity.title: If the consignor is a legal entity:
legalEntity.description: its short name and location (short name of the country according to the World Countries Classifier and address)

exporterSectionInfo.individualPersonExampleText:
"Alibaev Nuridin Kamalovich
Kazakhstan, Almaty, Suyunbay Avenue, house 450"
exporterSectionInfo.additionalInfo: If the consignor sends the goods on behalf of another person or in other similar cases, the graph first indicates the short name and location (legal address) of the consignor, then the short name and location (legal address) of the person on whose behalf the sender sends the goods.
exporterSectionInfo.additionalExample:
"LLC "Ros-Torg"
Russia, Khimki, Karlova street, 362
on behalf of LLC "Faraon"
Russia, Moscow, Bolshaya Polyanka street, 563"
exporterSectionInfo.note1: In the electronic GTD, each piece of information about the sender and the person on whose behalf the sender accepts the goods (the person who concluded the foreign trade contract (agreement, agreement) with the person indicated in column 9 of the GTD) and other persons indicated in the accompanying documents is indicated in a separate field.
exporterSectionInfo.note2: When declaring goods in paper form, the graph is not filled in on additional sheets.

additionalSheetInfo.title: 3. Additional sheets
additionalSheetInfo.description: The first subdivision indicates the serial number of the sheet, the second — the total number of GTD sheets presented, including the main and all additional sheets.
additionalSheetInfo.example1: If there is one GTD with two additional sheets, the GTD itself should indicate — «1/3», in the first additional sheet — «2/3», in the second — «3/3»
additionalSheetInfo.example2: If the GTD has no additional sheets, «1/1» is indicated
additionalSheetInfo.note: When declaring goods in electronic form, the column indicates the serial number of the sheet and the total number of GTD sheets, in the order established in this subparagraph, if the electronic GTD were printed on paper.

totalItemsInfo.title: 5. Total item names
totalItemsInfo.description: The column indicates the total number of item names specified in columns 31 of the GTD. This number must correspond to the number of filled columns 31 of the GTD.
totalItemsInfo.note: Note: Each item position in column 31 is considered a separate name

customsPostInfo.title: 7. GTD registration number
customsPostInfo.description3: of the customs post to which the GTD will be submitted, according to the Classifier of customs posts.
customsPostInfo.note: The code consists of 5 digits and is determined by the customs post where the goods are processed

fieldNotFilledInfo.message: In this mode, this column is not filled!

infoLabel.sendToRegisterInfo: Send customs value declaration to customs values register
infoLabel.deleteFromRegisterInfo: Remove customs declaration from customs values register

importerSectionInfo.title: 8. Importer/Consignee
importerSectionInfo.description: The graph indicates information about the recipient and importer of goods.
importerSectionInfo.label: The graph indicates:

sameEntity.title: If importer and recipient of goods are the same person:

individualPerson.title: for an individual person:
individualPerson.description: his surname, first name, patronymic and address of his permanent place of residence, as well as phone number
individualPerson.example:
"Qabirov Abdukarim Soliyev
Samarkand region, Samarkand city, Sherdor street, house 6, apartment 8, phone: 8-366-999-99-99"

individualPersonNonResident.title: for an individual person — non-resident:
individualPersonNonResident.description: his surname, first name, patronymic and address of his permanent place of residence, as well as phone number

legalEntity.title: for a legal entity:
legalEntity.description: its short name and location (legal address), phone number, as well as email address (if available)
legalEntity.example:
"LLC "Trans group"
Tashkent city, Yunusabad district, O'ch terak street, house 3, apartment 19, phone: +99871-999-99-99, email: pochta@pochta.uz"

structuralUnit.title: If a structural subdivision of a legal entity acts on behalf of the importer and recipient:
structuralUnit.description: short name, location (legal address), phone number and email address (if available) of the structural subdivision are specified, as well as the above-mentioned information about the legal entity
structuralUnit.example:
"LLC "Vodiy-Farg'ona"
Fergana region, Fergana city, Sanoat street, house 2, phone: 8-373-999-99-99, email: pochta@pochta.uz
branch of LLC "Vodiy"
Andijan region, Andijan city, Bobur street, house 597, phone: 8-374-999-99-99, email: pochta@pochta.uz"

differentEntity.title: If importer and recipient are different persons:
differentEntity.description: i.e., the recipient supplies the goods on behalf of the importer, or in other similar cases, the graph first indicates the short name and location (legal address) and phone number of the recipient, then the short name and location (legal address) of the importer (the person on whose behalf the goods are supplied)
differentEntity.example:
LLC "Kholis" 
Tashkent region, Chinaz district, Ukituvchilar street, house 17, phone: +998XX-XXX-XX-XX 
on behalf of JSC "Taminot", Tashkent city, Shaykhontohur district, A. Khojaev street, house 310.

importerSectionInfo.sameAsColumn9: If information about the importer is indicated in column 9 of the GTD, then it is not required to indicate information about the importer in this graph after the recipient

topRightSection.title: In the upper right part of the graph after the sign «№», if the recipients are:
topRightSection.individualResident: individual persons — residents, code «00000001» is indicated
topRightSection.individualNonResident: individual persons — non-residents, code «00000002» is indicated
topRightSection.stateShare: organizations with a state share in the authorized capital, code «00000003» is indicated
topRightSection.diplomatic: diplomatic missions and consular institutions, code «99999999» is indicated
topRightSection.internationalOrg: missions of intergovernmental organizations, missions of foreign government organizations for economic, technical cooperation and humanitarian assistance, permanent institutions, code «88888888» is indicated
topRightSection.other: persons not mentioned in paragraphs twenty-fourth to twenty-eighth of this subparagraph, then data are not indicated

bottomSection.title: In the lower part of the graph after the sign «№», the TIN of the recipient is indicated, and in case when a structural subdivision acts on behalf of the recipient, the TIN of the structural subdivision is indicated, then after the sign «/» the code of the district (city) in accordance with the Classifier of districts and cities of the Republic of Uzbekistan, given in Appendix No. 15 to this Instruction, according to the legal address (permanent place of residence of the individual person) is indicated
bottomSection.noTin: When declaring goods moved by persons without TIN, code «999999999» is indicated

importerSectionInfo.note: When declaring goods in paper form, the graph is not filled in on additional sheets

financialSettlementInfo.title: 9. Person responsible for financial settlement
financialSettlementInfo.description: The graph indicates the short name, location (legal address), phone number and email address (if available) of a legal entity or the surname, first name, patronymic, place of residence, as well as phone number of an individual person, who concluded the foreign trade contract (agreement, agreement) and is responsible for settlements under this foreign trade contract (agreement, agreement)

topRightSection.title: In the upper part of the graph after the sign «№», if the persons are:
topRightSection.individualResident: individual persons — residents, code «00000001» is indicated
topRightSection.individualNonResident: individual persons — non-residents, code «00000002» is indicated
topRightSection.stateShare: organizations with a state share in the authorized capital, code «00000003» is indicated
topRightSection.diplomatic: diplomatic missions and consular institutions, code «99999999» is indicated
topRightSection.internationalOrg: missions of intergovernmental organizations, missions of foreign government organizations for economic, technical cooperation and humanitarian assistance, permanent institutions, code «88888888» is indicated
topRightSection.other: persons not mentioned in paragraphs fourth to eighth of this subparagraph, then data are not indicated

bottomSection.title: In the lower part of the graph after the sign «№», the TIN (if individual person, then PINFL) of the person responsible for financial settlement is indicated, then after the sign «/» the code of the district (city) in accordance with the Classifier of districts and cities of the Republic of Uzbekistan, given in Appendix No. 15 to this Instruction, according to his legal address (permanent place of residence of the individual person) is indicated
bottomSection.noTin: When declaring goods moved by persons without TIN or PINFL, code «999999999» is indicated

financialSettlementInfo.note: The graph is not filled in the case of movement of goods under gratuitous transactions
